DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicentre non interventional observational study with the objective to follow up patients with atrial fibrillation who based on current indications are treated with per os flecainide , for cardiac pulse maintenance.
DOC.brief_title: Management of Atrial Fibrillation With Flecainide : the AFFLEC Study
DOC.detailed_description: the study objectives are - record safety and efficiency of flecainide as antiarrythmic treatment in atrial fibrillation - study of flecainide in ST interval
DOC.criteria: patients with history of atrial fibrillation patients able to give informed consent patients with coronary disease or other cardiopathy with left heart champer affected
